review:
Actually we came to her for 2nd opinion ***** ******** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ****d, but the way she explained current situation and future procedures we fall in love with it, she is very good counsellor too, ** *********** ******** *** ***** ** ***** 1st visit cost me 11.5k but Deepika ma‚Äùam asked for only 1 test and two tablets, now after one month my wife conceived naturally. Finally we are ‚Äúto be parents ‚Äú after 6 year of our marriage.
she responds on WhatsApp too without any charge , no unnecessary visit, she is not #money #minded at all.
* ***** *** *** ** **** ****** ** ******* ****** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a consultation and a Uterus Removal surgery - Hysterectomy by Dr. Deepika Asati. 
I was recommended to Dr. Deepika Asati by a few of my friends.
Dr.Deepika is absolutely fantastic, she is extremely professional and knowledgeable, her friendly behaviour is really appreciable!
She explained things thoroughly and put myself and my husband at ease and less worried about the procedures I needed to do. 
I was booked in for surgery swiftly within 2 weeks of my first consultation and was extremely happy with post surgical recovery.

Post surgery consultations went well, Dr. Deepika kept constant communication directly with me and I felt very well looked after also in the post-op recovery at home.

Highly Recommend Dr. Deepika Asati.

For any Gynecology problem don't hesitate to see her. She's very approachable. 

A special thank you to Dr. Deepika!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepika asati is well experienced *** *** **** ********* ***** ******* ****** ** **** one can get the best advice and treatment from her. she is very friendly in nature.
Dr Deepika was very warm ,approachable and cleared all my doubts regarding my issue..commendable experience!üôè

Very bad experience n won't recommended anyone ** * ***** *** ****** *** ** *** *********** she was least interested in my health issue ans she made assumption by herself without giving a check up on what I had come. Second she came late by one hour 45 minutes, * *** **** ********** ** ** *** *** ***** rather taking concern about a patient, nobody was there to guide or tell about doctor visit, a girl was busy in her gossiping on mobile and guy who came was informed that I m not coming. Doctor was not at all interested in knowing about my issue instead she start putting her assumptions on me. Please don't go n put ur hard money for this doctor. The 17 years experience and ratings are not at all true. A patient telling three to four times suffering past two months still she was not interested in knowing about my issue. N my past gyanolist prescription she suggest me medicine. *** *** * ****** *** **** **** ****** ** ********* **** ******* ** ****** **** ***** ******
She‚Äôs amazing, I consulted for PCOS, she was extremely kind and listened to the problem patiently and she was quite friendly.
**** ********understand our issue and gave proper solution..she even guided me about my PCOD condition too
She was very quick n immediate to understand the issue. Very patiently heard the problem and diagnosed it very fast. After consultation support is also very nice.
The doctor is very sweet and patient. She hears the problem completely and then suggest and also follows up! Great!

I had taken appointment and visited the hospital. Dr. Deepika was very friendly with me and she made me to feel comfortable for which I was very happy. After that she had done my check up and prescribed with the treatment. I did not face any difficulties because clinic staff were well-trained. I am completely satisfied with this doctor, so I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family as well.
